scripts.wprod: set WEBPACK_MODE=prod &&    for /f "tokens=*" %a in ('echo %cd%\public') do @set NODE_PATH=%a      && public\.bin\webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.wdev: set WEBPACK_MODE=dev &&    for /f "tokens=*" %a in ('echo %cd%\public') do @set NODE_PATH=%a    && public\.bin\webpack --config webpack.config.js --progress --watch
scripts.prod: export WEBPACK_MODE=prod && export NODE_PATH="$(pwd)/public" && public/.bin/webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.dev: export WEBPACK_MODE=dev && export NODE_PATH="$(pwd)/public" && public/.bin/webpack --config webpack.config.js --progress --watch
